topic_title: narrate and describe in all major time frames.
can_do_statement: I can narrate and describe in all major time frames.

lessons.title: Describing Past Experiences: Childhood Memories
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to describe childhood memories using the imperfect tense.

cards.example_sentence: Cuando era niño, siempre jugaba en el parque.
cards.grammar_explanation: Imperfect tense marker for past habits.

cards.example_sentence: Solía visitar a mis abuelos cada verano.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used to express habitual actions in the past.

cards.example_sentence: Siempre quería un perro cuando era pequeño.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb of frequency indicating regular occurrence.

cards.example_sentence: Nunca me gustaba comer verduras.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb of frequency indicating lack of occurrence.

cards.example_sentence: Cada día después de la escuela, veía dibujos animados.
cards.grammar_explanation: Expresses routine or repeated events.

cards.example_sentence: Recuerdo que siempre me contaba historias mi abuela.
cards.grammar_explanation: Verb used to recall past events.

cards.example_sentence: Tenía cinco años cuando fuimos a la playa.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used with 'tener' to indicate age in the past.

cards.example_sentence: Mientras mi madre cocinaba, yo jugaba en el jardín.
cards.grammar_explanation: Connects simultaneous actions in the past.

cards.example_sentence: Era muy divertido ir a la feria del pueblo cada año.
cards.grammar_explanation: Describes a past experience as enjoyable.

cards.example_sentence: Me sentía muy feliz cuando recibía regalos en mi cumpleaños.
cards.grammar_explanation: Expresses a feeling or state in the past.

lessons.title: Narrating Past Events: Specific Instances
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to narrate specific past events using the preterite tense.

cards.example_sentence: Ayer fui al supermercado a comprar comida.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb indicating an event occurred the day before.

cards.example_sentence: La semana pasada visité a mis padres en su casa.
cards.grammar_explanation: Time expression indicating the previous week.

cards.example_sentence: El mes pasado viajé a México para mis vacaciones.
cards.grammar_explanation: Time expression indicating the previous month.

cards.example_sentence: Hace dos años que terminé la universidad.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used to indicate the time elapsed since an event.

cards.example_sentence: De repente, empezó a llover muy fuerte.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb used to indicate a sudden or unexpected occurrence.

cards.example_sentence: Primero fuimos al cine, entonces cenamos en un restaurante.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb to sequence events.

cards.example_sentence: Después de mucho trabajo, finalmente terminamos el proyecto.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb indicating the conclusion of a series of events.

cards.example_sentence: Lo que ocurrió fue muy extraño.
cards.grammar_explanation: Verb to describe something taking place.

cards.example_sentence: Terminé mi tarea a las ocho de la noche.
cards.grammar_explanation: Verb describing the end of an action.

cards.example_sentence: La película empezó a las siete en punto.
cards.grammar_explanation: Verb describing the start of an action.

lessons.title: Describing Future Plans and Intentions
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to express future plans and intentions using 'ir a' + infinitive and the future tense.

cards.example_sentence: Voy a estudiar español en España el próximo año.
cards.grammar_explanation: 'Ir a' + infinitive to express immediate future.

cards.example_sentence: El próximo año visitaré a mis familiares en Argentina.
cards.grammar_explanation: Time expression indicating the following year.

cards.example_sentence: Mañana iré al gimnasio por la mañana.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb indicating the day after today.

cards.example_sentence: La semana que viene tengo una entrevista de trabajo.
cards.grammar_explanation: Time expression indicating the following week.

cards.example_sentence: Dentro de dos meses me graduaré de la universidad.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used to indicate the time elapsed until an event.

cards.example_sentence: Pienso comprar una casa nueva pronto.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used to express plans or intentions.

cards.example_sentence: Espero viajar por Europa algún día.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used to express hopes for the future.

cards.example_sentence: Quiero aprender a tocar la guitarra.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used to express desires or wishes for the future.

cards.example_sentence: Tengo ganas de ir a la playa este fin de semana.
cards.grammar_explanation: Expressing a desire or inclination towards something.

cards.example_sentence: No sé qué me depara el futuro.
cards.grammar_explanation: General term for time that is to come.

lessons.title: Describing Current Situations and Ongoing Actions
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to describe current situations and ongoing actions using the present tense and present progressive.

cards.example_sentence: Ahora mismo estoy estudiando español.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb indicating the present moment.

cards.example_sentence: Actualmente trabajo en una empresa de tecnología.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb indicating the current situation.

cards.example_sentence: En este momento estoy leyendo un libro interesante.
cards.grammar_explanation: Time expression indicating the present moment.

cards.example_sentence: Estoy comiendo una pizza deliciosa.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used to describe actions in progress.

cards.example_sentence: Hoy es un día muy soleado.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb indicating the current day.

cards.example_sentence: Me siento muy cansado hoy.
cards.grammar_explanation: To express current emotions or feelings.

cards.example_sentence: Parece que va a llover.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used to describe current appearances or impressions.

cards.example_sentence: Soy estudiante de español.
cards.grammar_explanation: Used to describe permanent characteristics.

cards.example_sentence: Ahora entiendo la lección.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb expressing the present.

cards.example_sentence: Estoy cocinando la cena, mientras tanto, puedes poner la mesa.
cards.grammar_explanation: Indicates something happening at the same time as something else.

lessons.title: Describing Hypothetical Situations
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to describe hypothetical situations using the conditional tense.

cards.example_sentence: Si tuviera más tiempo, viajaría por todo el mundo.
cards.grammar_explanation: Conditional sentence structure.

cards.example_sentence: Me gustaría aprender a bailar salsa.
cards.grammar_explanation: Conditional form of 'gustar' to express desires.

cards.example_sentence: Podría ayudarte con tu tarea si quieres.
cards.grammar_explanation: Conditional form of 'poder' to express possibility.

cards.example_sentence: Debería estudiar más para el examen.
cards.grammar_explanation: Conditional form of 'deber' to express obligation or advice.

cards.example_sentence: Querría ir al concierto, pero no tengo dinero.
cards.grammar_explanation: Conditional form of 'querer' to express desires.

cards.example_sentence: Si fuera tú, aceptaría el trabajo.
cards.grammar_explanation: Common expression used to give advice.

cards.example_sentence: Sería genial ir de vacaciones.
cards.grammar_explanation: Conditional form of 'ser' to express what would be.

cards.example_sentence: Imagino cómo sería vivir en otro país.
cards.grammar_explanation: Verb used to describe creating mental images of possibilities.

cards.example_sentence: Posiblemente llueva mañana.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb expressing a hypothetical possibility.

cards.example_sentence: Quizás vaya a la fiesta si tengo tiempo.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb expressing uncertainty or possibility.

lessons.title: Describing Routines and Habits
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to describe daily routines and habits using reflexive verbs and adverbs of frequency.

cards.example_sentence: Normalmente me levanto a las siete de la mañana.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb of frequency indicating typical behavior.

cards.example_sentence: Generalmente desayuno café y tostadas.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb of frequency indicating common occurrence.

cards.example_sentence: A menudo voy al gimnasio después del trabajo.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb of frequency indicating frequent occurrence.

cards.example_sentence: Rara vez como comida rápida.
cards.grammar_explanation: Adverb of frequency indicating infrequent occurrence.

cards.example_sentence: Me levanto temprano los días de semana.
cards.grammar_explanation: Reflexive verb for getting out of bed.

cards.example_sentence: Me acuesto tarde los fines de semana.
cards.grammar_explanation: Reflexive verb for going to bed.

cards.example_sentence: Me ducho por la mañana antes de ir al trabajo.
cards.grammar_explanation: Reflexive verb for showering.

cards.example_sentence: Me visto rápidamente para no llegar tarde.
cards.grammar_explanation: Reflexive verb for getting dressed.

cards.example_sentence: Todos los días hago ejercicio.
cards.grammar_explanation: Indicates actions performed daily

cards.example_sentence: Cada semana voy al mercado a comprar frutas y verduras.
cards.grammar_explanation: Indicates actions performed weekly.
